backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all data types (Client, Task, Assignee, Todo, UserProfile) and CRUD operations with authorization mixin, persistent storage using Maps keyed by Principal, and auto-incrementing IDs for each entity.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four features for replacing dropdown Select controls with searchable/filterable Combobox components in TaskFormDialog, TasksPage, and ClientDetailPage using Shadcn/Radix UI components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend source files describing components, pages, hooks, and utilities with implementation details for client/task/assignee/todo management, authentication, bulk operations, and searchable Combobox controls.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes defining colors for background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, border, sidebar, and chart tokens using oklch color space.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with CSWA favicon, viewport meta tag, page title 'CSWA Group of Companies - Client & Task Management', and script loading main.tsx module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component with TanStack Router setup defining routes for dashboard, clients, tasks, assignees, and todos, authentication checks, profile setup modal, deferred URL cleanup hook, and error boundary wrapper.
frontend/src/components/assignees/Assign: Dialog component for bulk uploading assignees via CSV file with template download, file parsing, validation error display, preview table, and submission using useBulkCreateAssignees mutation with loading states and error handling.

Dialog component for creating, editing, and deleting assignees (teams) with form validation for name and captain fields. Includes confirmation dialog for deletion and manages form state with React hooks.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog that prompts new users to enter their name on first login. Cannot be dismissed until a name is provided and saved.
frontend/src/components/auth/SignedOutSc: Landing page for unauthenticated users featuring CSWA branding, Internet Identity sign-in button, and three feature cards highlighting client management, task tracking, and dashboard insights.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientBu: Dialog for bulk uploading clients via CSV file with template download, file parsing, validation error display, and preview table. Converts parsed rows to backend format and submits via bulk create mutation.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientFo: Dialog component for creating, editing, and deleting clients with fields for name, GSTIN, PAN, and notes. Includes form validation and delete confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppStartu: React error boundary component that catches startup errors and renders a fallback error screen. Logs errors to console for debugging.
frontend/src/components/errors/StartupEr: Error fallback UI displaying an alert icon, error message, and reload button when the application fails to start.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with sticky header, navigation sidebar (responsive mobile sheet), user profile dropdown with logout, and navigation links for dashboard, clients, tasks, assignees, and todos with active state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/tasks/InlineComm: Provides an inline editor for task comments with edit/save/cancel controls, showing a read-only view with hover-to-edit button when not editing. Uses the useUpdateTaskComment hook to persist changes and displays error messages on failure.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskBulkEd: Dialog component for bulk editing multiple selected tasks, allowing users to update fields like client, category, status, assignee, dates, and payment info across multiple tasks at once. Uses an UNCHANGED_SENTINEL pattern to distinguish between fields that should be updated versus left unchanged.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskBulkUp: Dialog for bulk uploading tasks via CSV file, providing template download, file parsing with validation, preview table of parsed tasks, and sequential task creation. Only imports Client Name, Task Category, and Sub Category fields from the CSV.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskDetail: Card component displaying comprehensive read-only task details including client info, dates, financial data (bill, advance, outstanding), payment status, and comments. Formats all data using utility functions and shows assignee with optional captain name.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskFormDi: Dialog form for creating new tasks or editing existing ones with fields for client, category, subcategory, status, assignee, dates, financial info, and comments. Uses combobox components for searchable dropdowns populated from existing data and handles null/empty status values with a sentinel pattern.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskQuickS: Inline dropdown component for quickly changing a task's status without opening a full edit dialog. Uses a sentinel value to represent null/empty status and updates the task via the useUpdateTask hook while preserving all other task fields.
frontend/src/components/todos/TodoBulkUp: Dialog component for bulk uploading todos via CSV file, with template download, file parsing, validation preview, and batch creation functionality.
frontend/src/components/todos/TodoFormDi: Dialog component for creating, editing, and deleting individual todos with form fields for title, description, completion status, priority, and due date.
frontend/src/constants/taskStatus.ts: Defines allowed task statuses, provides normalization functions for legacy status mapping, and includes validation and display utilities for task status values.
frontend/src/hooks/assignees.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD operations on assignees, including optimistic updates, bulk creation, and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/clients.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD operations on clients, including optimistic updates, bulk creation, and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/tasks.ts: React Query hooks for CRUD operations on tasks with captain information, including optimistic updates, partial updates, bulk creation, and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/todos.ts: Provides React Query hooks for CRUD operations on todos (get all, get one, create, update, delete, bulk create) with optimistic updates and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializes access control with admin token from URL params, and invalidates dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and save the current authenticated user's profile, with proper error handling and authentication checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeferredUrlCleanup: Hook that captures secret parameters (caffeineAdminToken) from URL hash, stores them in sessionStorage, and removes them from URL after router initialization to prevent hangs.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and provider with login/logout functionality, identity persistence, and configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm neutral/sage green color palette for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/dataParser.ts: Deprecated utility for parsing/encoding client data; now kept only for backward compatibility as Client model uses explicit fields without encoding.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/AssigneesPage.tsx: Page component for managing assignees with search, bulk selection/deletion, create/edit dialogs, and bulk upload functionality using a table view.
frontend/src/pages/ClientDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a single client with a dropdown selector to switch between clients, shows associated tasks, and provides edit functionality via a dialog.
frontend/src/pages/ClientsPage.tsx: Lists all clients in a searchable table with bulk selection, deletion, and upload capabilities; includes dialogs for creating/editing clients and bulk CSV upload.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows overview statistics (clients, tasks, assignees), revenue aggregations by category/subcategory/status, and lists of upcoming and overdue tasks with navigation to filtered task views.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Comprehensive task management page with search, multi-column filtering (status, category, client, assignee), sorting, bulk operations (edit, delete, export to Excel), and inline editing for comments and status.
frontend/src/pages/TodosPage.tsx: Manages a simple todo list with search, completion filtering, bulk selection/deletion, and dialogs for creating/editing todos and bulk CSV upload.
frontend/src/utils/assigneeCsv.ts: Provides utilities for generating CSV templates, parsing CSV files for assignee bulk upload, and validating rows with required fields (Team Name, Captain).
frontend/src/utils/clientCsv.ts: Provides CSV template generation, parsing, and validation utilities for bulk client uploads with fields like name, GSTIN, PAN, and notes.
frontend/src/utils/taskAggregations.ts: Aggregates task data by category, sub-category, and status to calculate revenue totals, counts, and comprehensive task statistics for reporting.
frontend/src/utils/taskCsv.ts: Handles CSV template generation and parsing for bulk task uploads with extensive field support including dates, financial data, and validation with error reporting.
frontend/src/utils/taskDisplay.ts: Provides consistent formatting utilities for task display including date formatting from bigint timestamps, currency formatting, and placeholder handling.
frontend/src/utils/taskExcel.ts: Exports tasks to Excel format by dynamically loading SheetJS library from CDN and converting task data to spreadsheet format.
frontend/src/utils/taskSort.ts: Implements multi-field sorting for tasks with support for various data types (dates, strings, numbers) and configurable sort direction with null-safe comparisons.
frontend/src/utils/todoCsv.ts: Provides CSV template generation, parsing, and validation for bulk todo uploads with fields including title, description, completion status, priority, and due date.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support and methods to clear parameters from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme extensions (colors using OKLCH, fonts, border radius, shadows, animations) and including typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state document for a tax consulting task/client management app, tracking architectural decisions, known issues (blank screen/loading hangs, task edit failures, admin token handling), and existing features including Internet Identity authentication and task/client management.
